00034 require_once('class_vars.inc');
00035 require_once('tools.inc');
00036 require_once('setup.inc');
00037 
00038 class Lexer {
00039     var $filename;
00040     var $lineno;
00041     var $lineitems;
00042     var $line;
00043     var $buffer;
00044     var $token;
00045     var $unget;
00046     var $keywordchrs;
00047 
00048     function Lexer() {
00049     $this->filename = '';
00050     $this->lineno = 0;
00051     $this->buffer = array();
00052     $this->line = array();
00053     $this->eof = 0;
00054     $this->token = '';
00055     $this->unget = array();
00056     $this->keywordchrs = '/ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789-_.';
00057     }
00058 
00059     function is_eof() {
00060     return $this->eof;
00061     }
00062 
00063     function load($filename = '') {
00064     global $symon;
00065 
00066     if ($filename == '') {
00067         runtime_error('layout parser: no file to load');
00068     }
00069     $filename = normalise_filename($filename);
00070     $filename = $symon['layout_dir'].'/'.normalise_filename($filename).'.layout';
00071     $this->filename = $filename;
00072     $buffer = load($filename);
00073     $this->buffer = preg_split("/\n/", $buffer);
00074     }
00075 
00076     function next_token() {
00077     global $symon;
00078 
00079     $token = $this->_next_token();
00080 
00081     if (isset($symon['lexer_debug'])) {
00082         $this->_display();
00083     }
00084 
00085     return $token;
00086     }
00087 
00088     function parse_error($errorstring, $lineno = 0) {
00089     if ($lineno == 0) {
00090         $lineno = $this->lineno;
00091     }
00092 
00093     runtime_error("parse error: $this->filename : $lineno : '$this->token' : $errorstring");
00094     }
00095 
00096     function parse_semicolon() {
00097     if ($this->eof) {
00098         $this->parse_error('Expected ;');
00099     }
00100     $token = $this->next_token();
00101     if ($token != ';') {
00102         $this->parse_error('Expected ;');
00103     }
00104     }
00105 
00106     function unget($token) {
00107     $items = preg_split('//', $token, -1, PREG_SPLIT_NO_EMPTY);
00108     foreach ($items as $k => $item) {
00109         $this->_unget_chr($item);
00110     }
00111     }
00112 
00113     function _get_chr() {
00114     $item = $this->_get_chr_and_nl();
00115     if ($item == "\n") {
00116         $item = ' ';
00117     }
00118     return $item;
00119     }
00120 
00121     function _get_chr_and_nl() {
00122     if ($this->eof) {
00123         runtime_error('internal: trying to get_chr while eof has been signalled');
00124     }
00125     if (count($this->unget)) {
00126         return array_shift($this->unget);
00127     }
00128     $item = '';
00129     while ($item == '') {
00130         if (count($this->lineitems) == 0) {
00131         $this->_get_next_line();
00132         if ($this->eof) {
00133             return;
00134         }
00135         return "\n";
00136         }
00137         $item = array_shift($this->lineitems);
00138     }
00139     return $item;
00140     }
00141 
00142     function _get_next_line() {
00143     if ($this->eof) {
00144         runtime_error('internal: trying to get_next_line while eof has been signalled');
00145     }
00146     if (count($this->buffer) == 0) {
00147         $this->eof = 1;
00148         return;
00149     }
00150     $this->line = array_shift($this->buffer);
00151     $this->lineno += 1;
00152     $this->lineitems = preg_split('//', $this->line, -1, PREG_SPLIT_NO_EMPTY);
00153     }
00154 
00155     function _next_token() {
00156     if ($this->eof) {
00157         runtime_error('internal: trying next_token while eof has been signalled');
00158     }
00159 
00160     $this->token = '';
00161     $ch = $this->_get_chr();
00162 
00163     while ($this->eof || !(strpos(" \t\r\n#", $ch) === FALSE)) {
00164         if ($this->eof) {
00165         return;
00166         }
00167         if ($ch == '#') {
00168         $this->_get_next_line();
00169         }
00170         $ch = $this->_get_chr();
00171     }
00172 
00173     if ($this->eof) {
00174         $this->token = '';
00175         return $this->token;
00176     }
00177 
00178     if ($ch == '"') {
00179         $this->token = $this->_get_quoted_string('"');
00180         return $this->token;
00181     }
00182     if ($ch == "'") {
00183         $this->token = $this->_get_quoted_string("'");
00184         return $this->token;
00185     }
00186     if (!(strpos($this->keywordchrs, $ch) === FALSE)) {
00187         $this->token = '';
00188         while (!(strpos($this->keywordchrs, $ch) === FALSE) || $this->eof) {
00189         $this->token .= $ch;
00190         $ch = $this->_get_chr();
00191         }
00192         if (!$this->eof) {
00193         $this->_unget_chr($ch);
00194         }
00195         return $this->token;
00196     }
00197     $this->token = $ch;
00198     return $this->token;
00199     }
00200 
00201     function _get_quoted_string($quote) {
00202 
00203     $start_lineno = $this->lineno;
00204     $this->token = '';
00205     $delimited = 0;
00206 
00207     $ch = $this->_get_chr_and_nl();
00208     while ($ch != $quote) {
00209         if ($this->eof) {
00210         $this->parse_error("starting $quote without closing $quote", $start_lineno);
00211         return;
00212         }
00213         if ($ch == "\\" && $quote == '"') {
00214         $ch = $this->_get_chr_and_nl();
00215         }
00216         $this->token .= $ch;
00217         $ch = $this->_get_chr_and_nl();
00218     }
00219     return $this->token;
00220     }
00221 
00222     function _unget_chr($ch) {
00223     $this->unget[] = $ch;
00224     }
00225 
00226     function _display() {
00227     print "<pre>\xa -- token = $this->token";
00228     print "\xa lexing $this->filename:$this->lineno";
00229     print "\xa line = $this->line";
00230     print "\xa items = ";
00231     if (count($this->lineitems)) {
00232         foreach ($this->lineitems as $k => $item) {
00233         print $item. '|';
00234         }
00235     }
00236     print "\xa unget = ";
00237     if (count($this->unget) > 0) {
00238         foreach ($this->unget as $item) {
00239         print $item. '|';
00240         }
00241     }
00242     print "\xa eof = $this->eof </pre>";
00243     }
00244 
00245     function _test() {
00246     global $symon;
00247 
00248     $this->load('hifn_test.layout');
00249     while(!$this->eof) {
00250         $token = $this->next_token();
00251     }
00252     }
00253 }
